Package armies

Class Armies

java.lang.Object
armies.Armies
Direct Known Subclasses:
Carthaginian, Celtic, Greek, Roman
public abstract class Armies
extends java.lang.Object
Class Armies serves every need in terms of creating and managing army. Also class Armies is abstract method because there should not be an army without faction.
Version:
2.0
Author:
Viktor Szitkey
